Business Analytics Professional passionate in Big Data Data
Engineering Consumer Analytics | Experience in Logistics & Supply
Chain Analytics | 3 years of working with Python SQL | MS Business
Analytics @USC Marshall
Los Angeles California United States
Summary
I am a Business Analytics Professional with a passion for delivering
datadriven insights and fostering relationships with people Being in
this field has allowed me to harness my technical strengths in data
analysis and become a strong contributor in a team setting
Prior to enrolling in the Masters of Science Business Analytics
program at USC's Marshall School of Business I have had
professional experience in Logistics and Supply Chain Analytics at
an acclaimed Consumer Goods ECommerce
I am working to advance my career in Data Engineering Business
Intelligence and Consumer Analytics
Experience
VeSync
2 years 9 months
Operational Data Analyst
May 2021  June 2023  2 years 2 months
Anaheim California United States
 Analysed inefficiencies in container allocation and implement forecasting
models to reduce warehouse storage costs
 Utilized Power Query to develop and automate inventory aging and allocation
reports to increase inventory turnover
 Perform extraction transformation loading of data into NetSuite and our
WMS to sync and maintain inventory levels
 Resolved all inventory discrepancies quarterly to assist the accounting
department during auditorial periods
 Automated Amazon monthly chargeback reports to identify the root cause of
loss in profit up to $50000
  Page 1 of 4    
 Developed a timestudy report to analyse inefficiencies in dropship fulfilment
to save on labour costs by $030 per order
Inventory Coordinator
October 2020  May 2021  8 months
Anaheim California United States
 Provide inventory detail and transfers as part of warehouse and order
fulfilment activities
 Monitor inventory movement from inbound containers along with retail and
dropship orders to produce daily reports
 Utilize Oracle Netsuite daily to maintain sufficient levels of inventory to
complete orders and solve discrepancies
 Collaborate with team members to produce KPI reports across the Logistic
department to improve efficiency
Indonesian Students at University of California Irvine
2 years 2 months
President
May 2019  June 2020  1 year 2 months
Irvine California United States
Director Of Operations
May 2018  May 2019  1 year 1 month
Irvine
 Organize weekly meetings to discuss future fundraising and social events to
be held across the academic year
 Work together with both the Events and Finance Director to plan and execute
future events efficiently
 Raised over $1 000 through several fundraising events to provide subsidized
costs of holding future social events
 Oversee all activities held by the association to ensure that they may run
smoothly assigned as the person of contact
Huawei
Partner Relations Intern
July 2019  August 2019  2 months
Singapore
 Assisted in organizing technological updates for existing products catered to
current and potential Huawei clients
 Researched and completed multiple customer handbooks to optimize clients’
needs with Huawei products
  Page 2 of 4

of gaining Huawei a new partner
GOJEK
Corporate Strategy Intern
July 2018  September 2018  3 months
Greater Jakarta Area Indonesia
 Analysed the performance of online vouchers of 3 GOFOOD merchants and
devised effective strategies for each
 Researched the foundation and made a business model for an internship
program that will be launched in the future
 Studied the possibilities and outcomes of transforming the company into a
reliable data management platform
 Collaborated with a partner to determine the factors that affect the traffic of
specified malls in Jakarta
Kumon North America Inc
Mathematics Tutor
February 2017  July 2018  1 year 6 months
United States
 Mentored about 80 children per session in both Mathematics and Reading
whilst following an organized syllabus
 Worked together with a team of tutors to manage the workload of satisfying
all children's educational needs
 Planned and setup each and every child's syllabus that requires inputting
data into an installed system
Microsoft
Research Student
July 2017  September 2017  3 months
Indonesia
 Teamed up with a partner to produce 500 informational and promotional
booklets about Office 365 targeted and distributed to multiple CEOs of small
and mediumsized businesses as well as corporations

advances to increase efficiency

Business Analytics Professional passionate in Big Data, Data
Engineering, Consumer Analytics | Experience in Logistics & Supply
Chain Analytics | 3 years of working with Python, SQL | MS Business
Analytics @USC Marshall
Los Angeles, California, United States
Summary
I am a Business Analytics Professional with a passion for delivering
data-driven insights and fostering relationships with people. Being in
this field has allowed me to harness my technical strengths in data
analysis and become a strong contributor in a team setting.
Prior to enrolling in the Masters of Science Business Analytics
program at USC's Marshall School of Business, I have had
professional experience in Logistics and Supply Chain Analytics at
an acclaimed Consumer Goods E-Commerce.
I am working to advance my career in Data Engineering, Business
Intelligence, and Consumer Analytics.
Experience
VeSync
2 years 9 months
Operational Data Analyst
May 2021 - June 2023  (2 years 2 months)
Anaheim, California, United States
• Analysed inefficiencies in container allocation and implement forecasting
models to reduce warehouse storage costs
• Utilized Power Query to develop and automate inventory aging and allocation
reports to increase inventory turnover
• Perform extraction, transformation, loading of data into NetSuite and our
WMS to sync and maintain inventory levels
• Resolved all inventory discrepancies quarterly to assist the accounting
department during auditorial periods
• Automated Amazon monthly chargeback reports to identify the root cause of
loss in profit up to $50,000
  Page 1 of 4    
• Developed a time-study report to analyse inefficiencies in drop-ship fulfilment
to save on labour costs by $0.30 per order
Inventory Coordinator
October 2020 - May 2021  (8 months)
Anaheim, California, United States
• Provide inventory detail and transfers as part of warehouse and order
fulfilment activities
• Monitor inventory movement from inbound containers along with retail and
dropship orders to produce daily reports
• Utilize Oracle Netsuite daily to maintain sufficient levels of inventory to
complete orders and solve discrepancies
• Collaborate with team members to produce KPI reports across the Logistic
department to improve efficiency
